item.title: Consideration before Rental
item.description: Bad experience Don’t trust the landload compeletely. Before getting the key and clean house, don’t pay anything. Confirm which room, which floor. Check the door, make sure it won’t be locked by itself. Make sure the time to moving the luggage, be clear at which day and hour. If it changes, remind what was discussed before and ask why. Confirm 10 minutes early if it is not clear at time.
